Dating: HIGH-PRIESTS AND PRIEST-KINGS OF THEBES (not before); MASAHARTY ?; HIGH-PRIESTS AND PRIEST-KINGS OF THEBES (not after)
Name: Mummiform shabti for Teu-heryt
Description: This little mummiform shabti is made of deep blue glazed faience. The details and the one line vertical inscription on the front were added in black paint. Teu-heryt was probably the wife of Masaharta.
